markdownRemark.html:
Belle Creek Community

ANNUAL MEETING AGENDA

Saturday – May 6, 2017 – 10:00 a.m.
Belle Creek Family Center
10693 Belle Creek Boulevard
Henderson, CO 80640
303.289.3584

The meeting agenda will include the following matters:

1. Commerce City Police
Officer Ricky Evans
10:00-10:20
2. Commerce City Trash and Recycling
Stacie Rieber
10:20-10:40
3. Covenant Enforcement Committee
10:40-10:50
4. YMCA
Giovanni Forrest
10:50-11:05
5. HOA Dissolution
11:05-11:15
6. Community Outreach Website
11:15-11:30
7. Community Comments/Concerns/Questions
8. Adjournment

District Manager
Laurie Tatlock
2 Inverness Drive East, Suite 200
Englewood, CO 80112
Email: laurie@mulhernmre.com
Phone # 303-649-9857

Covenant Manager
Charles Wolfersberger
P.O. Box 8
Henderson, CO 80640
Email: charles@wolfersbergerllc.com
